name: Last Toon Standing
description: A new approach to battle royale, Singleplayer sandbox, fight with 50 or more Bots on large island, Last Toon Standing wins.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 32-bit, 2 GHz or Faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 610 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or newer Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 750 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
